column5: I am heading up to the Shining Tree Ontario area the first week of September. Wondering if anyone has been there before and could lend some advice. Have never been there and am wondering about the fishing, local attractions etc. Thanks, Ed

Usually stay about 20 miles east off 560. Several old mines - lost of mild off road roads throgh old timber cuts.Fishing is usual shield fishingWhere you staying ?This is my first year in about 10-12 that I'm not going up.Heard it's very DRY/Check my page on Gowganda areahttp://home.columbus.rr.com/paulhaskins/gowganda.htmhttp://home.columbus.rr.com/paulhaskins/fish.htmdrop me an email when you get back - address is on my main page
